Celebrating the 100th episode of US sitcom The Big Bang Theory, Rick Edwards travels to the Hollywood set for an access-all-areas visit, catching up with the cast and learning everything there is to know about the show.
This behind-the-scenes special takes fans through everything from the writing of the script to the recording of the show in front of a live audience.
